type TableCellCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装 和 对象的集合，这些对象组成了 控件中的一行。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of and objects that make up a row in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类以编程方式管理一系列中的行构成对象控件。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that make up a row in a control. 此类通常用于添加或删除的行中单元格控件。This class is commonly used to add or remove cells from a row in a control. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件包含集合，表示一系列对象。A control contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 每个表示表中的单个行，并包含集合，表示一系列对象。Each represents an individual row in the table and contains a collection that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象表示表中的单个单元格。These objects represent the individual cells in the table. 若要获取的单个单元格，必须先获取从的集合控件。To get an individual cell, you must first get a from the collection of a control. 然后就可以获取从的集合。You can then get a from the collection of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式填充控件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically fill a control. 对象，它表示各个单元格，添加到，这些对象表示单个行中，通过属性。 objects, which represent individual cells, are added to objects, which represent the individual rows, through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableCellCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableCellCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Appends the objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以追加到集合中指定的数组对象。Use the method to append the objects from the specified array to the collection. 构造表的行时，通常使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you are constructing a row of a table. 若要构造表的行，请先创建一个数组对象来表示行的单元格。To construct a row of a table, first create an array of objects to represent the cells of the row. 接下来，使用方法，传递数组作为参数，以添加到集合的对象。Next, use the method, passing the array as an argument, to add the objects to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法中添加到数组中的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to add the objects from an array to a . 请注意，在此示例中，的属性的一个实例类。Note that in the example, the property of the is an instance of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于删除所有中的对象并设置属性设为 0。Use this method to remove all objects from the and set the property to 0. > [!NOTE] > 此方法移除中的对象，但它不会删除从控件。This method removes the objects from the , but it does not remove the from the control. 请确保也会删除如果你想要完全从表中删除行。Be sure to also remove the if you want to completely remove a row from the table. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来删除所有center 中行的表的对象并将其替换为新对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all objects from the center row of the table and replace them with new objects. returns.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含 内的所有 对象。

span.span: A implemented object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建实现可以循环访问轻松地获取每个项的对象。Use this method to create a implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the . 使用指向当前获取项的属性的集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法以将枚举数移回初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 必须在创建后调用方法实现的对象，或使用后方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项。The method must be called after creating a implemented object or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建实现的对象。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a implemented object. 它然后循环访问所选行中显示的项。It is then iterated through to display the items in the selected row. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TableCellCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法移除元素对象。Typically, you should use the method to remove an element from a object. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
